name: Mitigation Playbook for Command and Scripting Interpreter Attack
description: This playbook addresses the incident where an attacker leveraged a scripting interpreter to execute commands aimed at data exfiltration.

action--4a9ee90e-ac1e-4e84-b0e4-bbc365a2.name: Kill malicious process
action--4a9ee90e-ac1e-4e84-b0e4-bbc365a2.description: Terminate any suspicious scripts running on the server.

if-condition--fb2cbe2e-d312-4e38-89b3-0c.name: Check if process is still running

action--2f5e1c57-5f96-43d5-bdc6-ea8870ef.name: Isolate affected host
action--2f5e1c57-5f96-43d5-bdc6-ea8870ef.description: Disable network interface of the compromised host.

parallel--4e3d33d0-df3b-4529-bb7f-172505.name: Perform Additional Mitigations
parallel--4e3d33d0-df3b-4529-bb7f-172505.description: Execute various post-incident actions in parallel.

action--f376d3bb-a80d-4670-b84e-e46b0f5e.name: Scan for additional threats
action--f376d3bb-a80d-4670-b84e-e46b0f5e.description: Repeat scanning for threats until none are found.

commands.command: while [ ! -z "$(ps aux | grep suspicious_command)" ]; do sleep 5; done

action--b5200fbe-68da-418b-bf48-07879b86.name: Update firewall rules
action--b5200fbe-68da-418b-bf48-07879b86.description: Block any malicious IPs identified during the incident.

action--1e8ccdb5-9c67-46c0-b890-7551e2fd.name: Review access logs
action--1e8ccdb5-9c67-46c0-b890-7551e2fd.description: Check the access logs for unauthorized activity related to the affected host.
